Reviews.Title: Night Owl ADV-DVR16-5GB  16
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: Terrible qualitly.. I didn't hook it up until a few days before the 30 day return so It was to late when I realized it has a terrible picture and "slow" skipping frames. I had to set it aside (I can't return it, its junk now want to buy it?) and re install my old DVR that was in service.

ProductInfo.Features:
16 Channel smart DVR with pre-installed 500GB hard drive
Free Night Owl Pro software and CMS software for your PC or Mac
Motion activated push notifications and or email alerts
View, playback and configure your system anywhere in the World from your Smartphone or Tablet
ProductInfo.Name: Night Owl Security ADV-DVR16-5GB 16-Channel Security System with 500GB HD and  Pro Software (Black)
